alert.name: HighErrorRate
alert.description: HTTP 500 rate > 5% for 10m. Possible regression after deploy.

hypotheses: 5xx spike: bad deploy, config regression, or dependency returning errors.
first_steps: Check scope: is it only trade-api in trading, or are dependent services impacted too? (dashboards/service map)
Check recent changes: deploy/config/feature flags within the last 30â€“60 minutes
Kubernetes quick check: kubectl -n trading get pods,events && kubectl -n trading describe pod <pod>
Logs: filter by correlation/request-id (if available) and scan for ERROR/timeout spikes
Performance: latency p95/p99, error rate, saturation signals (CPU/Mem/DB pool/queue lag)
